articles.title: Brain Adapts to Neuron Loss Through Rapid Rewiring - Neuroscience News
articles.summary: Brain Adapts to Neuron Loss Through Rapid Rewiring FeaturedNeuroscience·June 14, 2025 Summary: New research shows that the brain’s cortex can rapidly reorganize itself after losing neurons, allowing other nerve cells to take over lost functions. Scientists studied neural networks in the auditory cortex and found that although sound-processing patterns were briefly disrupted, the brain formed nearly identical patterns within days.
